page.title: 13Woolley Service Station
page.content: Woolley Edge Service Station is on the M1 near Wakefield.There are really two service stations, one at each side of the motorway.We arrived at the southbound station and waited in the hall for the shift manager, whose name was Katherine Watson.We started to ask her questions.The service station has been open for 16 years.Each day it opens from 7.00 a.m.to 10.30 p.m. They have about 400 customers a day.I was suprised and looked around.There certainly were quite a few people there.Sometimes famous people call in like Geoff Boycott and Freddie Starr. Some were business men, some lorry drivers, and some holiday makers.There are 81 people working in the service station.
